item.title: Marketing
item.description: Overview In this section are listed all the marketingâ€™s costs of the projects per month. With Marketing costs we mean all the costs that your business can have that are related to the promotion of your activity or product. In order to add a Marketing cost you just have to select the starting and ending date, choosing the value that you will pay monthly and save, in this way you will see the total cost for the indicated period.
